oh no! Where are all the 
 Playpens? Create a group now, 
 add your Buddies and share the
 joy of seeing your child grow."
You don\'t have any buddy to add in group
Ready to get started? Add your \n child\'s first post or photo here!
Oops! It looks like none of your \n Buddies have shared \n anything...yet!
Ready to write the greatest \n children\'s story ever told? Add \n your child and share their posts & photos here!
You have to add your child first \n in order to preserve his/her \n memories
Well, this is awkward...you \n don\'t appear to have any \n Buddies at the moment!

Invite your friends and family 
 to follow your child's Story 
 by simply sharing their 
 unique code below!

So You've been invited to follow a story? 
 You must be pretty important! 
 Just enter the unique code you've 
 been given, tell us what the child 
 calls you & you'll be ready to go!
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Attachment is much long, max size is 12mb
You need native facebook app to perform this action
Here are your friends that can see your Child\'s Story
Here are your Little Buddies Who\'ve accepted your request to follow their story
You have to add your child first \n in order to preserve his/her \n memories
Click on the button to request specific permission
The location permission is necessary to locate hotels near you
Without location permission we can\'t show hotels near you
Wee need camera permission to take a picture of your swimming pool
Without camera permission swimming pool selfies are disabled

Getting started is easy! Fill in your 
 child’s details and you’ll be ready to 
 start recording your child’s journey on 
 Skwibble!

Don’t worry! Recording your child’s 
 funny memories, milestones & special 
 moments is safe and secure with 
 Skwibble.

Create Playpens for each of your 
 different groups of family and friends 
 and allow them to share and 
 contribute to your Child’s Story!
Add photos of your child regularly & \n look back at how your child has \n changed and grown day by day!
Still need help? Why not get in \n touch! Email the team and we’ll get \n back to you as quick as we can!
Please go through our \n Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy

Know any friends with kids 
 who would love Skwibble? 
 Share the invite below to get 
 them started!
Know any friends with kids who would love Skwibble? \n Share the invite below to get them started.
Sorry! you don\'t seem to have added any buddies yet! \n Click the button to add their code now!
You can relax! There are no invite requests pending!
